cells.data:
Duplicated the broken one, made it work by replacing `T` with `U` for the typedef.

run

```sh

~/\_code/\_build/swig-debug/swig -fortran -c++ -debug-typemap spbug.i 2\>&1 | grep -v '}' | sed -e 's/: Hash(.\*//' | sort | uniq \> types.txt

```

then diff the two, and it's clear something fishy is going on with the template parameters because some of them are missing from the "bad" tpyemaps.
